name: competitions_standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zeus_api.
Tool description: This API returns information on the 5 major European football leagues.
Get standings, matches, scorers and more.
API description: Fetch the current standings for a specified competition using the Zeus API.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the competition.

year.description: The year for which standings are to be retrieved. Defaults to '2020'.
